sentences.en: Duncan was taken to the memorial hospital with internal injuries and dislocation of his spine.

sentences.en: That means industry dislocation and massive unemployment, maybe as high as fifty percent.

phrases.tran_cn: 刃型位错；边缘位错；刃差排

trans.tran_cn: [医]脱位，脱臼，[物]位错，混乱，紊乱，[地]断层
trans.tran_en: Dislocation is a situation in which something such as a system, process, or way of life is greatly disturbed or prevented from continuing as normal
